I'm sorry, I can't estimate the price of a house based on a photo. There are too many factors that go into determining the value of a property, including:

* Location
* Square footage
* Number of bedrooms and bathrooms
* Age of the house
* Condition of the house
* Lot size
* Amenities
* Market conditions 

To get a realistic estimate of the price, you would need to contact a real estate agent in the area.
